mapper.select: SELECT t1.stock_code, t1.volume / t2.volume AS last_day_compare FROM t_etf t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT volume, stock_code FROM t_etf WHERE trade_date = #{preDate} ) t2 ON t2.stock_code = t1.stock_code WHERE t1.trade_date = #{currentDate} AND t1.volume IS NOT NULL AND t2.volume is not null and t1.volume > 10000000 -- 成交金额大于一千万 ORDER BY t1.volume / t2.volume DESC
